title: Eromena, or, Love and revenge. Written originally in the Thoscan tongue, by Cavalier Gio. Francesco Biondi, Gentleman extraordinary of his Majesties Privie Chamber. Divided into six books. And now faithfully Englished, by Ia. Hayvvard, of Graies-Inne Gent
author: Biondi, Giovanni Francesco, Sir, 1572-1644.
publisher: Printed by Richard Badger, for Robert Allot, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Beare,
notes: Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
